SoftwareInventory.description: The SoftwareInventory schema contains an inventory of software components.  This can include software components such as BIOS, BMC firmware, firmware for other devices, system drivers, or provider software.
SoftwareInventory.longDescription: This Resource contains a single software component that this Redfish Service manages.

title: #SoftwareInventory.SoftwareInventory
